Open Finite State Machine Library.

1.0

Version:
1.0.0b
Author:
Abdulla G. Abdurakhmanov (abdulla.abdurakhmanov@gmail.com).
Date:
(c) 2006

Intro

The OFSM library contain a simple finite state machine implementation.

Features

  • Simple and ease-to-use
  • Customizable and flexible
  • Machine may be configured from network or local XML resource.
  • Contain a tool for creating model.

Notes

This documentation describe only API of library, without any internal implementation notes.
